name: Basic.subject
title: Basic.subject
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Identifies the focus of this resource
element.definition: Identifies the patient, practitioner, device or any other resource that is the "focus" of this resource.
element.comment: Optional as not all potential resources will have subjects.  Resources associated with multiple subjects can handle this via extension.
element.requirements: Needed for partitioning the resource by Patient.
